name: GHOSTSCAPE
description:
Me and my family  moved in this place a while back and since the first time I read about it and gave me the creeps, so I started digging more. I found out about her, a shadow of someone she once was.

She lived here 200 years ago, and she had a sad ending in this land. I found out there were things that kept her here that she couldn't leave behind so I left in a journey to help her to transcend so I can build my house in peace, and she can find the exit. 

I found a picture of the old house, it's nice but I'm glad that is gone, some how it's haunting presents can still be felt.
